name: Verify WFH Date and WFH Reason are mandatory fields

testSteps.description: 1: Verify WFH Date and WFH Reason are mandatory fields ({parentTab=Leave Management, childTab=Apply, defaultTab=Leave, tab=Work From Home, heading=Apply Leave / WFH / Comp Off / Out Duty / Change Request})

children.description: Given User is logged into MIS
When User is on MIS Home Page
When User clicks on "Apply" sub tab of "Leave Management" tab
And Verify "Apply Leave / WFH / Comp Off / Out Duty / Change Request" of "Apply" tab
When User clicks on "Work From Home" Tab
Then Click on Submit button for WFH tab
Then Verify "Work From Home Date" dropdown is mandatory field
Then Verify "WFH Reason" text box is mandatory field

userStory.narrative: This tests are for Apply module of MIS Beta

title: Verify WFH Date and WFH Reason are mandatory fields

values: Apply Leave / WFH / Comp Off / Out Duty / Change Request

dataTable.scenarioOutline:

Then Verify "Work From Home Date" dropdown is mandatory field
